control.name: radioGroupHourFormat
control.description: This radio group editor allows the hour format to be specified.

control.name: comboBoxTimeFormat
control.description: This combo box allows the time format to be specified.

control.name: comboBoxTimeEditStyle
control.description: Changes the edit style of the sample TimeEdit. You can choose either the calendar or spin button editors. In both cases you can select desired value and use the mouse scroll to modify this value.

control.name: teMask
control.description: Indicates the currently applied Edit Mask according on the "Hour format" and "Time format" values.
